name: Ribbit King
overview: Ribbit King is a must-have for fans of both crazy racing games and wild platformers. Planet Hippitron is short on natural resources - to secure some, Scooter must win the powerful "Super Ribbinite". To do that, he'll race on 20 different courses, across 5 different worlds. Beat all your opponents at Frolfing to earn the prize -- and save your world!
